templates.name: Classic Professional
templates.description: Traditional, formal cover letter format for corporate roles

opening_strategy.description: Direct expression of interest with brief background
opening_strategy.example: I am writing to express my strong interest in the {job_title} position at {company_name}. With {years} years of experience in {field}, I am confident in my ability to contribute to your team's success.

body_structure.description: Two paragraphs highlighting relevant achievements and skills

closing_strategy.example: I would welcome the opportunity to discuss how my experience aligns with your needs. I am available for an interview at your earliest convenience and look forward to hearing from you.

templates.name: Modern/Enthusiastic
templates.description: Energetic and personable approach for creative and fast-paced environments

opening_strategy.description: Engaging opening that shows excitement and connection
opening_strategy.example: When I discovered the {job_title} position at {company_name}, I knew I had to apply. Your mission to {company_mission} resonates deeply with my own passion for {relevant_passion}, and I'm excited about the possibility of contributing to your innovative team.

body_structure.description: Narrative approach combining passion with concrete results

closing_strategy.example: I'm genuinely excited about the opportunity to bring my skills and enthusiasm to {company_name}. I'd love to chat more about how I can contribute to your team's success. Thanks for considering my application!

templates.name: Technical/Results-Driven
templates.description: Data-focused letter emphasizing quantifiable achievements and technical expertise

opening_strategy.example: During my tenure at {previous_company}, I {major_achievement with numbers}. This experience has prepared me exceptionally well for the {job_title} role at {company_name}, where I can apply my expertise in {key_skills} to drive similar results.

body_structure.description: Heavy emphasis on quantifiable results and technical skills

closing_strategy.description: Confidence in ability to deliver results
closing_strategy.example: I am confident that my track record of {key_strength} would translate into measurable value for {company_name}. I would appreciate the opportunity to discuss specific ways I could contribute to your team's objectives.

templates.name: Career Change
templates.description: Addresses career transition by focusing on transferable skills and motivation

opening_strategy.description: Explain the career change with authentic motivation
opening_strategy.example: After {years} years in {previous_field}, I am excited to transition into {new_field} and bring a unique perspective to the {job_title} role at {company_name}. My decision to pivot is driven by {genuine_reason}, and I believe my background in {previous_field} provides valuable skills that translate directly to this opportunity.

body_structure.description: Connect previous experience to new role requirements

closing_strategy.description: Express commitment and readiness to contribute
closing_strategy.example: I am committed to bringing my diverse skill set and fresh perspective to {company_name}. I would welcome the opportunity to discuss how my unique background can add value to your team.

templates.name: Referral-Based
templates.description: Leverages a mutual connection or referral to establish credibility

opening_strategy.description: Lead with the referral to establish immediate credibility
opening_strategy.example: {Referral_name}, {their_title} at {company_name}, suggested I reach out regarding the {job_title} position. {Referral_name} and I {how_you_know_them}, and based on their description of the role and your team culture, I am excited about the opportunity to contribute my {relevant_skills} to {company_name}.

body_structure.description: Build on the referral's recommendation with concrete qualifications

closing_strategy.description: Thank the referral and express interest in next steps
closing_strategy.example: Thank you for considering my application. I'm grateful to {referral_name} for the introduction, and I look forward to the opportunity to discuss how I can contribute to your team.

templates.name: Cold Application
templates.description: Proactive outreach when no position is advertised

opening_strategy.description: Demonstrate knowledge of and interest in the company
opening_strategy.example: I have been following {company_name}'s work in {specific_area} with great interest, particularly {specific_project_or_achievement}. While I recognize you may not have an open {job_title} position at this time, I wanted to reach out to explore potential opportunities to contribute to your team.

body_structure.description: Concise statement of what you can offer

closing_strategy.description: Request for informational meeting or future consideration
closing_strategy.example: I would appreciate the opportunity to have a brief conversation about your team's needs and how my background might be a good fit, either now or in the future. Thank you for your time and consideration.

templates.name: Follow-up After Networking
templates.description: Maintains momentum after meeting at an event or informational interview

opening_strategy.description: Reference the networking interaction to jog memory
opening_strategy.example: It was a pleasure meeting you at {event_name} last {timeframe}. Our conversation about {specific_topic} was particularly enlightening, and I was excited to learn about the {job_title} opening at {company_name}. I am writing to formally apply for the position.

body_structure.description: Build on the networking conversation with qualifications

closing_strategy.description: Thank them for their time and express desire to continue dialogue
closing_strategy.example: Thank you again for your time and insights at {event_name}. I'm excited about the possibility of joining {company_name} and would welcome the opportunity to continue our conversation about how I can contribute to your team.

short.use_case: Cold applications, networking follow-ups, quick applications

long.use_case: Executive positions, academic roles, detailed explanations needed

focus_area_definitions.leadership: Highlight team management, mentoring, strategic decision-making
focus_area_definitions.technical: Emphasize technical skills, tools, methodologies, certifications
focus_area_definitions.results: Focus on quantified achievements, metrics, business impact
focus_area_definitions.creativity: Showcase innovative thinking, design, creative problem-solving
focus_area_definitions.communication: Highlight presentation skills, writing, stakeholder management
focus_area_definitions.collaboration: Emphasize teamwork, cross-functional projects, relationship building
